title: Disconnecting immediately even though it hasn't popped on the loading screen yet.
body: There are instances where I have disconnected, even though it hasn't popped the loading screen up yet, and goes straight back to the client, every time i say "reconnect" it won't let me connect. instead it will not even pop the loading screen no matter how long i wait so the team that i am in is forced to do a remake. Can anyone help me with this problem? It cannot be a bug because i am seeing streamers playing the game, though i might be wrong.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're getting a Network Disconnection error. If this is true, then there's likely an issue in your local network settings that's preventing your client from properly reaching the servers. I recommend working through the common solutions that can be found in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) that are likely to fix this problem.

Let me know if those steps helped.
it's a general issue as of right now, a decent amount of people have been experiencing the same thing (including me)  not sure if riot has done anything as of yet
Alright, then i guess it's the waiting game then. Until riot fixes the problem, it's off to another game.
